messages.subject: homeschoolers in Houston, TX
messages.msgSnippet: Are there any homeschoolers  on this list in SW/Fondren area. I was homeschooling my nine-year-old son in the Spring, and would like to keep it that way.
messages.messageBody:
Are there any homeschoolers on this list in SW/Fondren area. I was
homeschooling my nine-year-old son in the Spring, and would like to keep it
that way. However, I have to finish my degree. I need to find a solution
for my child during the day. Help!

Bonnie

Paths to Success - Interactive success programs for Adults and Teens with
the ADD label. Hands-on classes, seminars, organization and coaching.
713-728-8641.
